name: Tom Hanks
bio: Academy Award-winning actor known for roles in Forrest Gump, Cast Away, and Saving Private Ryan.

name: Meryl Streep
bio: Most nominated actor in Academy Award history, known for The Devil Wears Prada and Sophie's Choice.

name: Christopher Nolan
bio: Acclaimed director known for Inception, The Dark Knight trilogy, and Interstellar.

name: Quentin Tarantino
bio: Award-winning director and screenwriter known for Pulp Fiction, Kill Bill, and Django Unchained.

name: Leonardo DiCaprio
bio: Oscar-winning actor known for The Revenant, Titanic, and Inception.

name: Emma Stone
bio: Academy Award-winning actress known for La La Land, The Favourite, and Easy A.

name: Steven Spielberg
bio: Legendary director known for Jaws, E.T., Jurassic Park, and Schindler's List.

name: Scarlett Johansson
bio: Actress known for Lost in Translation, The Avengers series, and Marriage Story.

name: Martin Scorsese
bio: Acclaimed director known for Goodfellas, Taxi Driver, and The Departed.

name: Jennifer Lawrence
bio: Oscar-winning actress known for Silver Linings Playbook, The Hunger Games, and Winter's Bone.

name: Aaron Sorkin
bio: Academy Award-winning screenwriter known for The Social Network, A Few Good Men, and The West Wing.

name: Ryan Gosling
bio: Actor known for La La Land, Drive, and The Notebook.

name: Denis Villeneuve
bio: Director known for Arrival, Blade Runner 2049, and Dune.

name: Cate Blanchett
bio: Two-time Oscar winner known for Blue Jasmine, The Aviator, and Elizabeth.

name: David Fincher
bio: Director known for Fight Club, The Social Network, and Gone Girl.

name: Brad Pitt
bio: Oscar-winning actor and producer known for Once Upon a Time in Hollywood, Fight Club, and 12 Years a Slave.

name: Greta Gerwig
bio: Director and writer known for Lady Bird, Little Women, and Barbie.

name: Timothée Chalamet
bio: Actor known for Call Me by Your Name, Dune, and Little Women.

name: Jordan Peele
bio: Director and writer known for Get Out, Us, and Nope.

name: Zendaya
bio: Actress known for Euphoria, Dune, and Spider-Man: No Way Home.

name: Taika Waititi
bio: Director known for Jojo Rabbit, Thor: Ragnarok, and What We Do in the Shadows.

name: Florence Pugh
bio: Actress known for Little Women, Midsommar, and Black Widow.

name: Bong Joon-ho
bio: Oscar-winning director known for Parasite, Snowpiercer, and Memories of Murder.

name: Adam Driver
bio: Actor known for Marriage Story, Star Wars sequel trilogy, and BlacKkKlansman.

name: Chloé Zhao
bio: Oscar-winning director known for Nomadland and Eternals.

name: Lupita Nyong'o
bio: Oscar-winning actress known for 12 Years a Slave, Black Panther, and Us.

name: Charlie Kaufman
bio: Academy Award-winning screenwriter known for Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind, Adaptation, and Being John Malkovich.

name: Saoirse Ronan
bio: Actress known for Lady Bird, Little Women, and Brooklyn.

name: Ari Aster
bio: Director known for Hereditary, Midsommar, and Beau Is Afraid.
